stance_1: I am concerned about environmental impact
stance_2: I am trying to eat less meat
justification: Interviewee states they are eating less meat because of environmental concerns.

stance_1: I am concerned about health effects of processed meat substitutes
stance_2: I am trying to eat less meat
justification: Concern about health effects of processed substitutes may conflict with the effort to eat less meat if substitutes are the main alternative.

stance_1: I am concerned about health effects of processed meat substitutes
justification: Interviewee explicitly expresses concern about health effects even as they acknowledge improvement in meat substitutes.

stance_1: I am trying to eat less meat
justification: Interviewee cites improved meat substitutes as a factor that makes eating less meat easier.
